section.title: ShaderNodeTexPointDensity(ShaderNode)
section.paragraph: base classes — bpy_struct, Node, NodeInternal, ShaderNode

list_item.paragraph: Closest Closest, No interpolation (sample closest texel).

desc_content.paragraph: Object to take point data from
Data to derive color results from

list_item.paragraph: PARTICLE_AGE Particle Age, Lifetime mapped as 0.0 - 1.0 intensity.
PARTICLE_SPEED Particle Speed, Particle speed (absolute magnitude of velocity) mapped as 0.0-1.0 intensity.
PARTICLE_VELOCITY Particle Velocity, XYZ velocity mapped to RGB colors.

desc_content.paragraph: Particle System to render as points
Point data to use as renderable point density

list_item.paragraph: PARTICLE_SYSTEM Particle System, Generate point density from a particle system.
OBJECT Object Vertices, Generate point density from an object’s vertices.

desc_content.paragraph: Radius from the shaded sample to look for points within
Resolution used by the texture holding the point density
Coordinate system to calculate voxels in
Vertex attribute to use for color
Data to derive color results from

list_item.paragraph: VERTEX_COLOR Vertex Color, Vertex color layer.
VERTEX_WEIGHT Vertex Weight, Vertex group weight.
VERTEX_NORMAL Vertex Normal, XYZ normal vector mapped to RGB colors.

desc_content.paragraph: True if a registered node type
Cache point density data for later calculation

field_body.paragraph: float array of 1 items in [-inf, inf]
min, min, float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf]
max, max, float array of 3 items in [-inf, inf]
The RNA type or default when not found.
The class or default when not found.
